CustomField.description: It is the way in which Points can be converted into. The options include: "Fixed Value" (Fixed assigned number of Points), "Factor" (numerical field related to the "Target Object" that can be divided by a specific number) and "Multiplier" (numerical field related to the *Action* object that can be multiplied by a specific number).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose how Points are calculated for this Rule: Fixed Value for a fixed number of Points, Factor for a numerical field that is divided by a specified value and Multiplier for a numerical field that is multiplied by a specified value
CustomField.label: Point Conversion Mode
